We value and welcome your feedback, which plays an integral role in enhancing the Cooper's Hawk Winery & Restaurants experience. As our valued guests, your input is essential, and we will respond within a reasonable timeframe. We appreciate your patience, and more importantly, we appreciate you.

Private Events
Overview
Make Your Event Special at Cooper’s Hawk.
Our private event spaces are designed to welcome Guests with the warmth and elegance of the wine world.
Our unique restaurant lends itself to highlighting wine and food pairings like none other. The stunning surroundings and memorable menu offerings are only enhanced by our signature style of hospitality: anticipatory, knowledgeable, and kind.
We believe that great wine and food bring people together and that the spirit of celebration is at the center of every great event. We invite you to share life’s special moments—with family, friends, and coworkers—at Cooper’s Hawk.
Pri­vate Events Menu
View Menu
Inquire About Pri­vate Events
Click Here
Wine Club Member Benefits
Members receive 1 point per dollar spent. For every 350 points earned, Members will receive a $25 Reward to be used at any Cooper’s Hawk location.
Members can use their available Wine Club bottles for their parties and events.
Members can use their Loyalty & Birthday Rewards towards purchases at their events.
Private Event purchases do not count towards earning Ambassador Credits.
Our event was flaw­less from start to fin­ish. The Coop­er’s Hawk team made our father’s
70
th
birth­day cel­e­bra­tion a day our entire fam­i­ly will nev­er for­get. Thank you for everything!
Matt S.
Earn points on your Private Event
Join the Wine Club and enjoy benefits
Learn more

Gift Memberships
A gift that keeps on giving
Membership Types
Gift Memberships
Benefits

Special Events

Friends of Cooper's Hawk
Wine Club Dinners

Ambassador Club
Wine Club Newsletter
FAQ
Celebrate every occasion with the perfect gift—A Cooper’s Hawk Gift Membership! Whether it’s a birthday, holiday, anniversary, or just because, it’s a delicious way to share the love and give a gift that keeps on pouring!
A 3-Month Gift Membership
starts at $70.49
, which includes an exclusive Wine Club bottle each month for 3 months, and Member benefits such as points and dining rewards, wine and carryout discounts, and access to special offers and events.
Choose a
Variety
membership for a loved one who is new to wine, or a
Red, White, or Sweet
membership for those who already know what they like. Gift Memberships are available for
3, 6, and 12 months
, and you can give
one or two bottles per month
. Bottles can be picked up at one of our 65+ restaurants or shipped to an address in select states: AZ, CT, FL, GA, IL, IN, LA, MD, MI, MO, NE, NV, NH, ND, OH, OR, VA, WV, WI, WY.
Pur­chase A Gift Membership
Starting at $70.49
(opens in new window)
About The Cooper's Hawk Wine Club
Our Wine Club* is unlike any other, and that’s why we are the largest in the country!
Most Members choose to
pick up
their wine at our 65+ restaurants in 14 states, where they also enjoy
wine tasting
in our Napa-inspired Tasting Rooms and our menu infused with flavors from around the world, each dish paired with a wine from our diverse wine list.
Discover: Enjoy a new, handcrafted, exclusive wine release every month, with
tasting notes
and recipes
Customize: Option to swap your Wine Club wine for 50+ other wines on our menu
Unwrap: Birthday rewards, points for dining rewards, discounts on retail wine (up to 20% off), and carryout (10% off)
Connect: We are part of your local community and are always here to help you enjoy the benefits of membership, including exclusive events and content!
Wine Club
Gift membership
s are great as a holiday gift, and you can
treat yourself
by becoming a Member too!
Join
now and choose the 1-bottle or 2-bottle per month. Membership is month-to-month, and you can
cancel anytime
. We can't wait to see you!
Pur­chase A Gift Membership
Starting at $70.49
(opens in new window)
Treat Your­self
Join for $24.49 per Month
(opens in new window)
* Red/White/Varietal/Sweet Wine Club options available. Certain wines of the month are not available for Sweet Club Members but they will be able to choose from applicable wines on our menu. Exclusions and upcharge may apply for swapping a Wine of the Month for other wines. You will be charged the monthly Membership fee for the current month when you join, then on every fourth Tuesdays of each month. Delivery/Ship option only available in select states. See
Wine Club Overview
page and Wine Club
Terms & Conditions
for details.
Wine Club Gift Memberships

The Cooper’s Hawk Wine Club was created to celebrate community and to toast to our shared love for good food, good wine, and good company. Gather with us each month to enjoy a multicourse wine pairing dinner, specially created and centered around exciting themes!

Wine Club Members are invited to experience our Friends of Cooper’s Hawk events. These dinners, book signings, wine tastings, and chef presentations are an opportunity to interact with celebrity chefs and sommeliers. These special evenings provide a warm, intimate, and memorable way to expand your knowledge of both food and wine!

Wine Club Newsletter
FAQ
The Cooper’s Hawk Wine Club was created to celebrate community and toast to our shared love for good food, good wine, and good company. Join us for our monthly Wine Club Dinners, extraordinary celebrity events, or tasting events. We invite you to join us!
Monthly Wine Club Dinners
Our Cooper’s Hawk monthly Wine Club Dinners are famous for inspiring friendships. Taste deliciously crafted multicourse menus that complement our award-winning wines. Sip by sip, you’ll see why these Member-Only themed events are so popular.
View Upcoming Dinners
Friends of Cooper's Hawk Events
Experience our Friends of Cooper’s Hawk events. These dinners, book signings, wine tastings, and
chef presentations are an opportunity to interact with celebrity chefs and sommeliers. These special evenings provide a warm, intimate, and memorable way to expand your knowledge of both food
and wine.
View Upcoming Events
Please note: Wine Club Guests must be 21 or older to attend. Wine Club Event purchases do not count towards Wine Club Point-earning or Ambassador Credits.
Exploring the World
One Glass at a Time
Our wine trips take Wine Club Mem­bers to cel­e­brat­ed loca­tions around the world for unique and unfor­get­table guid­ed experiences.
Join Us

Wine Club Newsletter
FAQ
Become a Wine Club Member to discover a new wine every month in our dining room or at home, plus enjoy dining rewards, discounts, and more! Enjoy or pick up your bottle at any of our 65+ Cooper's Hawk locations or at Piccolo Buco by Cooper's Hawk.
Join
the 1 bottle per month Club for $24.49 to take home a bottle of our Wine of the Month! Monthly wine tasting for two is included in the 2- and 3-bottle Memberships.
Become a Member
Join now
(opens in new window)
Membership Types
Membership is month-to-month, and we offer various options to cater to your preferences. You can
update or cancel
your Membership anytime.
1)
Choose 1, 2, or 3 bottles per month
: Most Members choose the 2 or 3-bottle per month option, which includes
monthly wine tastin
gs for two
.
2)
Choose a Club* (Variety / Red / White / Sweet)
: We release a new handcrafted wine each month with insider tasting notes and recipes to guide your discovery journey. Depending on the Club type, you can get the Wine of the Month or swap* for other wines on our wine list.
3)
Choose Pickup or Delivery
: Most Members pick up or enjoy their wine when they dine with us, but a quarterly delivery option is also available in select states.
Join
the one-bottle Variety/Red/White Club at $24.49 to enjoy our current
Wine of the Month
. Learn more about other Member Benefits below, including points and rewards.
Become a Member
Join now
(opens in new window)
* Certain wines of the month are not available for Sweet Club Members but they will be able to choose from applicable wines on our wine list. Exclusions and upcharges may apply for swapping a Wine of the Month for other wines. You will be charged the monthly Membership fee for the current month when you join, then on every fourth Tuesday of each month. See Wine Club
Terms & Conditions
for details.
Gift Memberships
Our Wine Club Memberships make great gifts for friends, family members, loved ones or as a corporate gift. Gift Memberships are available in 3, 6, or 12 month periods. Purchase a
gift membership
today.
Quarterly Delivery Memberships
Delivery option is available in select states, where 3-months' worth of wine is shipped and billed quarterly, and an adult 21 years or older must be present to sign for the delivery. Purchase a
delivery membership
today.
Receive monthly wines, insider tasting notes, and delicious recipes not available to the general public.
Wine Club Benefits
We're here to help you get the most out of your Membership. Both you and your plus one on your account can enjoy benefits at our 65+ Cooper's Hawk locations and Piccolo Buco by Cooper's Hawk.
Already a Member?
Log in
to upgrade to the two or three-bottle option!

Members also get access to.......
Wine Club Dinners
At every one of our locations, our Wine Club Members are invited to our monthly
Wine Club Dinners
. These extraordinary, multiple-course meals are always themed around a wine, cheese, recipe, or cultural experience. Paired with wines, each exclusive course is crafted by our chefs specifically for the Members-only event.
Friends of Cooper's Hawk Events
Experience our
Friends of Cooper’s Hawk events
. These dinners, book signings, wine tastings, and chef presentations are an opportunity to interact with celebrity chefs and sommeliers. These special evenings provide a warm, intimate, and memorable way to expand your knowledge of both food and wine.
Wine Club Trips
Every year, our Founder Tim McEnery, Chef Matt McMillin, and Master Sommelier Emily Wines plan epic trips to some of the world’s greatest wine regions, and the itineraries are crafted with our adventure-loving Members in mind. Take time away to live the wine country lifestyle with other members of our Cooper’s Hawk family. Expand your horizons, explore the world of wine and global cuisine, and create memories and friendships that will last a lifetime. See
Wine Club trips
.

Monthly Tasting Menu
Stop by our Napa-Style Tasting Room and sample one of our latest wine selections. A tasting includes seven to eight different wines.
View Tasting Room Notes
Wine of the Month
Ninety Nine Oaks
is a bold and powerful red wine that’s sure to make an impression. With luscious flavors of black cherry, black raspberry, and currant jam, it’s beautifully complemented by hints of clove and a long, smooth finish of vanilla and spice from oak aging. It’s the perfect wine to enjoy with your ultimate hamburger—whatever variation make it yours. This is a wine that elevates comfort food into something truly special.
Watch Videos
Master Sommelier Emily Wines
Emily Wines is one of only 149 Mas­ter Sommeliers in the Americas and one of 15 professionals who have been awarded the prestigious Remi Krug Cup for passing all three sections of the exam on her first attempt.

Exploring the World
One Glass at a Time
Our wine trips take Wine Club Mem­bers to cel­e­brat­ed loca­tions around the world for unique and unfor­get­table guid­ed experiences.
Join Us
Become a Wine Club Member to discover a new wine every month in our dining room or at home, plus enjoy dining rewards, discounts, and more! Enjoy or pick up your bottle at any of our 65+ Cooper's Hawk locations or at Piccolo Buco by Cooper's Hawk.
Join
the 1 bottle per month Club for $24.49 to take home a bottle of our Wine of the Month! Monthly wine tasting for two is included in the 2- and 3-bottle Memberships.
Become a Member
Join now
(opens in new window)
Membership Types
Membership is month-to-month, and we offer various options to cater to your preferences. You can
update or cancel
your Membership anytime.
1)
Choose 1, 2, or 3 bottles per month
: Most Members choose the 2 or 3-bottle per month option, which includes
monthly wine tastin
gs for two
.
2)
Choose a Club* (Variety / Red / White / Sweet)
: We release a new handcrafted wine each month with insider tasting notes and recipes to guide your discovery journey. Depending on the Club type, you can get the Wine of the Month or swap* for other wines on our wine list.
3)
Choose Pickup or Delivery
: Most Members pick up or enjoy their wine when they dine with us, but a quarterly delivery option is also available in select states.
Join
the one-bottle Variety/Red/White Club at $24.49 to enjoy our current
Wine of the Month
. Learn more about other Member Benefits below, including points and rewards.
Become a Member
Join now
(opens in new window)
* Certain wines of the month are not available for Sweet Club Members but they will be able to choose from applicable wines on our wine list. Exclusions and upcharges may apply for swapping a Wine of the Month for other wines. You will be charged the monthly Membership fee for the current month when you join, then on every fourth Tuesday of each month. See Wine Club
Terms & Conditions
for details.
Gift Memberships
Our Wine Club Memberships make great gifts for friends, family members, loved ones or as a corporate gift. Gift Memberships are available in 3, 6, or 12 month periods. Purchase a
gift membership
today.
Quarterly Delivery Memberships
Delivery option is available in select states, where 3-months' worth of wine is shipped and billed quarterly, and an adult 21 years or older must be present to sign for the delivery. Purchase a
delivery membership
today.
Receive monthly wines, insider tasting notes, and delicious recipes not available to the general public.

Wine Club Dinners
At every one of our locations, our Wine Club Members are invited to our monthly
Wine Club Dinners
. These extraordinary, multiple-course meals are always themed around a wine, cheese, recipe, or cultural experience. Paired with wines, each exclusive course is crafted by our chefs specifically for the Members-only event.
